akka.cluster.fastfailover

Class AbstractFastFailoverSupport

  • java.lang.Object
    • akka.actor.AbstractActor
      • akka.cluster.fastfailover.AbstractFastFailoverSupport
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    akka.actor.Actor, FastFailoverSupport

    public abstract class AbstractFastFailoverSupport
extends akka.actor.AbstractActor
implements FastFailoverSupport
    Java API: Support for implementing fast failover with an abstract actor.

    Simply extend this class rather than AbstractActor.

    Note that this is incompatible with any other abstract class due to Java's lack of multiple inheritance support. If you need to extend a different class, you should use FastFailoverHelper instead.
